thread.title: Waha pipeline fire to cause output loss up to 100,000 bpd: NOC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Waha pipeline fire to cause output loss up to 100,000 bpd: NOC
text:
TUNIS (Reuters) - A fire at a crude pipeline owned by Libyan Waha oil firm feeding the Es Sider oil port will cause a production loss of between 70,000 barrels a day and 100,000 bpd, state firm NOC said on Saturday.
The cause of the fire was unclear, NOC said in a tweet.
Reporting by Ulf Laessing; Editing by Daniel Wallis
